Although many fonts confirm the accuracy of the used formula (see article Water Need Formula), there are no indicators about who actually invented it.
In which spectrum can the input values be?
In order for the app to work properly, we have set a couple of value limits. For example, the maximum weight value is 200 kg.
What does the model assert? / How can the result be interpreted?

You can use this formula to be informed about your personal recommended water supply. Please note: the results predict a general amount of liquid your body daily needs, and that consists of water and food!
